about_the_game:
Combat is fast-paced, tactical, and brutal. Swords are weighty but responsive. Each fighter has unique weapons and abilities. Wield plasma-sabers and cut down your opponents. Slash from the shadows with a trusty dagger, dashing through deathblows like smoke. Crash through your enemies defenses with a massive greatsword. Create your own combat style and dominate the battlefield.

Features
  • Physics-based PVP and PVE sword combat. Weapons clash realistically, and positioning is key as you fight your way to the top.
  • Dedicated servers running at 128hz provide a stable, competitive experience.
  • Master five different characters, each with unique weapons and abilities, and create your own fighting style. More weapons and characters are being worked on.
  • An infinite, procedural PVE mode where you can battle for the top spot on the leaderboard.
  • Five maps, and more to come
  • Team deathmatch, oddball, and free for all modes.

short_description: An ultra-realistic multiplayer sword fighting game. Physics drive everything. Clash blades with competitors in neon-lit streets. Create your own style from endless possibilities. Become a legend. Parry, pivot, and thrust your way to victory.
